1235600.name: Shadows of Larth - Art-book
1235600.description:
The Shadows of Larth Art Book will showcase the design process of the legendary weapons you will use while playing the Shadows of Larth, the Art-book will outline three classes: "One Handed", "Two Handed" and "The Pole Arms".

Index :


  • Introduction
  • Geopolitics of Larth - Map of the Lower Larth
  • Geopolitics of Larth - Map of the Upper Larth
  • Geopolitics of Larth - Sigils of the Realms of Larth
  • One Handed Class - Glyfe of the Marked
  • One Handed Class - The Sun Blade
  • One Handed Class - Sword of Ernavyl
  • Two Handed Class - Sygian Great Sword
  • Two Handed Class - Blade of Mylor
  • Two Handed Class - The Moon Great Sword
  • Pole Arms Class - Herdas Axe
  • Pole Arms Class - Spear of Mandryk
  • Pole Arms Class - Crafters Hammer
  • Pole Arms Class - Spear of Itri
  • Pole Arms Class - Axe of Ellys
  • Conclusion

Bonus

High Res Screenshot library (3840px X 2160px) 14 In-Engine Capture (1920px X 1080px) 16 In-Engine Capture
